stories.headline: Children 'weaponised' in toxic trans debate, Cass says
stories.description: Clinician Dr Hilary Cass says "people at the extremes" had caused a lot of distress for young people.

stories.headline: North London measles outbreak hits several schools with tens of children infected
stories.description: A number of children have been hospitalised as officials urge families to check they are up to date with their vaccines.

stories.headline: What is the ‘dart frog’ toxin, said to be linked to Alexey Navalny’s death?
stories.description: Five European countries allege that Russians poisoned Navalny, which caused his death about two years ago.

stories.headline: US says over 5,700 suspected ISIL detainees relocated from Syria to Iraq
stories.description: Iraqi authorities confirm the transfer, saying detainees of 61 nationalities have arrived in the country.

stories.headline: ‘Clown show’: Obama reacts to Trump sharing racist monkey video
stories.description: Without mentioning Trump by name, Obama says a majority of Americans ‘find this behavior deeply troubling’.
